document.discussion_title: Antonio secures West Ham's first Premier League win at new ground
document.topic_text: LONDON (Reuters) - Injury-hit West Ham United beat Bournemouth 1-0 to record their first Premier League victory at their new London Stadium thanks to a late header from Michail Antonio on Sunday. »
document.post: LONDON (Reuters) - Injury-hit West Ham United beat Bournemouth 1-0 to record their first Premier League victory at their new London Stadium thanks to a late header from Michail Antonio on Sunday. »
